User Story: As a user, I want to read engaging narrative content that matches my selected world so I can immerse myself in the story.
Acceptance Criteria:
The AI Service generates narrative text that aligns with the selected world's genre and description
Generated content follows the basic tone inferred from world description
The system maintains narrative context between generated segments
Content is engaging and encourages continued interaction
Narrative segments are of appropriate length (neither too short nor excessively long)
Technical Requirements: The system must integrate with an AI service to generate narrative content. It must provide world configuration data (genre, description, tone) to guide content generation. The system must maintain narrative context between generated segments and display the generated narrative appropriately.
Implementation Considerations: Consider what aspects of world configuration have the most impact on narrative quality and style. Think about how to maintain continuity across multiple narrative segments. Balance between providing enough context to the AI and managing token usage efficiently. Consider how to structure prompts to encourage engaging content of appropriate length.

User Story: As a user, I want the narrative to acknowledge my character's attributes and skills so the story feels personalized.
Acceptance Criteria:
Generated narrative incorporates the active character's name throughout the story
Character's primary attributes influence narrative descriptions when relevant
Character's skills are acknowledged in appropriate situations
Narrative respects character background information
Character traits affect how NPCs interact with the player character
Technical Requirements: The system must provide character information (name, attributes, skills, background) to the AI as part of the narrative context. The narrative generation process must incorporate this character information to create personalized content that acknowledges the character's unique traits.
Implementation Considerations: Consider which character attributes are most narratively significant and how they should influence the story. Think about natural opportunities to reference character skills without feeling forced. The personalization should feel authentic rather than mechanical or repetitive.

User Story: As a user, I want content that respects my chosen tone settings so the narrative style meets my expectations.
Acceptance Criteria:
The AI Service respects tone settings specified in the world configuration
Content adheres to the selected content rating and maturity level
Generated narrative maintains a consistent tone throughout the session
Narrative style (serious, humorous, dramatic, etc.) aligns with world settings
Language complexity is appropriate for the selected world
Technical Requirements: The system must honor tone settings specified in the world configuration. These settings must influence the style, content rating, maturity level, and language complexity of generated content. The system must maintain consistent tone throughout narrative sessions.
Implementation Considerations: Consider how to effectively communicate tone preferences to the AI in a way that produces consistent results. Think about how to help users select appropriate tone settings that match their expectations. Balance tone consistency with narrative variety to maintain engagement.

User Story: As a user, I want properly formatted text with paragraphs and dialogue so it's easy to read.
Acceptance Criteria:
Narrative text is formatted with standard paragraph breaks
Dialogue is formatted with appropriate quotation marks and attribution
Important elements receive proper emphasis through formatting
Text is visually organized for easy reading
Formatting is consistent across all narrative segments
Technical Requirements: The system must process AI-generated text to ensure proper formatting. It must handle paragraph breaks, dialogue formatting with quotation marks, and appropriate emphasis of important elements. The system must display text in a visually organized, readable manner.
Implementation Considerations: Consider whether formatting should happen before or after AI generation, or both. Think about how to preserve formatting from AI output while ensuring consistency. The text display should support accessibility while maintaining good reading aesthetics.

User Story: As a user, I want to make meaningful decisions that affect the narrative so I feel agency in the story.
Acceptance Criteria:
The system presents 3-4 distinct choices at appropriate narrative junctures
Each choice offers a meaningfully different approach to the situation
Player selections are recorded and tracked by the system
Choices feel significant rather than superficial
Decisions influence the direction of the narrative
Technical Requirements: The system must identify appropriate points to present choices to the player. It must generate 3-4 distinct and meaningful choice options that offer different approaches to the situation. The system must record player selections and use them to influence the subsequent narrative direction.
Implementation Considerations: Consider how to determine good decision points in the narrative flow. Think about what makes choices feel meaningful to players rather than superficial. Balance between choices that have immediate impact and those with long-term consequences. The choices should reflect the character's abilities and situation.
